title: THE MATRIX 4 - Theories, What We Know, and Keanu Is Back!
author: Think Story
comment: Will you take the red pill or blue pill? 💊
My plot theory: After coming back to reality Neo receives a beagle puppy to help him cope. But when a trio of Russian gangsters kill the puppy, Neo goes on a rampage like we've never seen before.
What a time to be alive! I need Morpheus back tho

This movie is shaping up to be amazing!

So many great ingredients...
* Lana Wachowski

I was saying this today. The 3rd movie was left open and also that neo didn't actually die as such he could still see the golden scene after he was rested. I hope that Laurence comes back too pleaseeeee
description:
Today we take a look at the huge announcement of The Matrix 4 with Keanu Reeves and Carrie-Ann Moss reprising their roles as Neo and Trinity. Here's what we know so far and some possible theories!
